summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1527, for the improvement of East Sixty-fifth Street, from Brooklyn Avenue to Seventeenth Avenue Northeast, by laying a water main therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses and other appurtenances which may be necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 16471 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
